Class ec.ezlib.base.FileSugar

public class FileSugar
extends Object
A sweetener defining extra messages that may be e-sent to a File.

OTHER_TYPE

asString(File)
Gets the contents of the file as a text string, normalizing the newlines into '\n's.
each(File, AssocFunc)
If the file is a directory, enumerate filename => File associations for each child of the directory.
list(File)
Repair a bug (XXX that we need to report) in java.io.File.list()
toString(File)
Normalize the EZ-printed form to use forward slashes as separators.

OTHER_TYPE 
 public static final Class OTHER_TYPE

each 
 public static void each(File file,
                         AssocFunc func) throws Throwable
If the file is a directory, enumerate filename => File associations for each child of the directory. The child File objects are separated from their parent with "/" independent of platform. Otherwise assume it's a text file and enumerates lineNumber => text line associations. Like Perl, each text line ends with a "\n".

list 
 public static String[] list(File file)
Repair a bug (XXX that we need to report) in java.io.File.list()

toString 
 public static String toString(File file)
Normalize the EZ-printed form to use forward slashes as separators. EZ'ers can still use getPath() to get the path as the File object sees it.

asString 
 public static String asString(File file) throws IOException
Gets the contents of the file as a text string, normalizing the newlines into '\n's.
